name: Glutto, the eater of worlds
description:
Glutto, the hungriest alien in the galaxy, thrives on the essence of planets. Frightened by the tentacle-wielding diety, hordes of spaceships are launched into a path of war to prevent you from depleting all life force of their homeworlds. Slap your way through the universe, devouring all planets you can !

Created for the 2019 December LIBGDX Jam
